    AnalogToVoltage(int, double)

    Converts analog reading to voltage for ESP32 (12-bit ADC, 3.3V reference)

    Declaration

    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    int analogReading

    Analog reading value (0-4095)
    double referenceVoltage

    Reference voltage (default 3.3V for ESP32)
